name: NADA (Dr.Ramilo)
description:
This is NADA, my very first game, made in RPG Maker 2003

Nada is a small, short and easy game, made to be a quick distraction, inspired  by titles like  Space Funeral, Hylics, Yume Nikki, OFF and Earthbound.

In this game, you explore a set of strange white islands, talk to NPCS and battle guardians to access the next islands.

FEATURES:

-9 boss battles

-2 secret bosses and optional party members

-Multiple NPCS with quirky dialoge

-11 Maps total

-Cute, simple, monochrome graphics

If people like this game, I shall add a postgame

Hope you enjoy!
